name: Cook-Off Party
summary: Get ready to be grilled. Become the best chef in the world! Now is your chance to become the ultimate chef! Cook up a storm using recipes from around the world. Let get cooking! - Challenge friends and family in 40 fun and immersive mini-games. Up to 4 players! - Use the Wii Remote to grill, cook, bake, cut, roll - Unlock new recipes such as Ratatouille, Cheese Fondue and Maki Sushi as you progress through the different modes. - Thanks to the crazy interactive board, embark on a tour of international cuisine.
